title: What is the best course of study for girls after higher secondary education? - Quora

response.answer_text: It totally depends on what you are interested in studying. If you have interest in what you study, then you can score good and also study without any burden. One of the very interesting courses is, journalism. If you enrol for any such course, then it can prove to great for you career. Such type of courses actually allow you to explore your thinking ability. Besides, there are many other options like, software programming, hotel management etc.

It depends upon the subject she has taken..in case of medical subject she can prepare for neet,in case non-med she can prepare for http://jee.in In case of commerce she can go prepare for http://accoutancy in case of arts she can prepare for multiple exams like IAS,IPS http://etc….in between she can go for any exam for multiple posts.. she can also try selfemployment….
